scripts.build: tsc && vite build --mode testnet && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/pvp/keys ./dist/keys && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/pvp/zkir ./dist/zkir
scripts.build-undeployed: tsc && vite build --mode undeployed && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/pvp/keys ./dist/keys && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/pvp/zkir ./dist/zkir
scripts.build-batcher: tsc && vite build --mode batcher-undeployed && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/pvp/keys ./dist/keys && cp -r ../contract/dist/managed/pvp/zkir ./dist/zkir
